column3: As this code isn't particularly performance critical, I prefer the current shorter code.
Not being changed by this PR, but seems bad to me that length is not checked on serialization (only on deserialization).

Although you could add a sanity check, serialization is probably too late to check it. Ideally anything inputting account/label names should check this to be able to give an useful error and reject setting it before putting it in a data structure.\nBut yes, out of scope here.
